amendatorysection.catchline: Changes under Laws 2003, LB 46; legislative intent.
amendatorysection.para: It is the intent of the Legislature that the changes made to the Nebraska Treatment and Corrections Act by Laws 2003, LB 46, with respect to parole eligibility apply to all committed offenders under sentence and not on parole on May 24, 2003, and to all persons sentenced on and after such date.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Treatment and Corrections Act, see section 83-1,135.
